headline.main: PAINTERS TO GIVE PAY TO WAR SUFFERERS; 12,000 to Relax Ironclad Rule and Work Saturday

lead_paragraph: Next Saturday will be "Defend America Day" for 12,000 members of District Council 9 of the Brotherhood of Painters, Decorators and Paperhangers, A.F. of L. The union painters, relaxing an ironclad rule against Saturday work, will take up their brushes as "a weapon against Hitlerism" and will contribute their earnings to organizations engaged in promoting national defense and in distributing relief to the victims of Nazi oppression.
